name: BowMan's Adventure
description:
Welcome to BowMan's Adventure! 

BowMan's adventure is a 2D platformer game where you play as the main character BowMan. Your goal is to try and collect all the coins in all Four levels. Collet these coins while avoiding the monsters roaming the levels! There are three types of enemies to be encountered, Melee, ranged, and a ground enemy that patrols, but don't get to close! They will take you out with one hit! 

Controls- 

Left/Right Arrow keys- Move

Shift key- Run

F key- Shoot

Space- Jump (Double tap to double jump)

Shift/Space- Jump Boost

There are Screenshots of all four levels included for you to use as maps to help you guide you through the levels, as well as show you where all of the coins are at.
